column4: quelle est la commande pour obtenir la taille d'un dossier et de tous ses sous-dossiers ?
Unknown. packages.ubuntu.com tends to go down occasionally, it's usually back up within a few hours. What were you looking for? It might be accessible in another way.
linux-source-2.6.28 is in the main repository, so it should work with the standard sources.list lines (which would look something like http://paste.ubuntu.com/250712/ )
i'm looking for this package : linux-source-2.6.28-14-generic
but i still can't find it in your repos
You're probably looking for "linux-source-2.6.28". The current version in jaunty-security/main is 2.6.28-14, and the source is the same for -generic, -server, etc. (only the config is different).
in other words, "sudo apt-get install linux-source-2.6.28" is probably what you need to do.
then install the KDE terminal and use that instead ;P
